item.description:
May 14th & 15th the CIPNE Annual Conference has guest PhotoShop Rock Star Chris Alvanas- Yes- you've read his PS articles in After Capture Magazine and heard him speak at PhotoPlus- He's Coming to MA to The CIPNE Conference!

2010 Image Competition & Annual Conference Featuring Photoshop Workshop by Chris Alvanas

Chris Alvanas is a digital artist and an accomplished post-production retoucher for high-end beauty and fashion. As a photographer, Chris is known commercially for his quirky kids images. His fine art delves into the worlds of jazz music and dance by illustrating the musician's relationship with the instrument, and the motion of the dancer. Chrisâ€™s work has been featured in such magazines as Shutterbug, Nikon World, Popular Photography, and the Nikon Pro website. His articles have appeared in After Capture magazine. Chris is a regular speaker at both Photo Plus Expo in New York and PMA in Las Vegas. Chris is an instructor for the Nikon Mentor Series and is the Director of Photography at CDIA of Boston University in Washington D.C.

Chris's web site http://www.lightyeari...

Cost: Sat
CIPNE members Free
Non-members $59
Full-time Students $20

Friday, May 14th ~ Members only
Image Competition
5:00pm - 9:00pm

Saturday, May 15th Chris Alvanas
Registration: 8:00am - 9:00am
Program: 9:00am - 12:30pm
Lunch: 12:30pm - 1:30pm
Program: 1:30pm - 5:00pm

Location: THE NEW EP LEVINE's!
E.P. Levine
219 Bear Hill Road
Waltham, MA, 02451
Registration required
Visit www.cipne.org to register & reserve your seat. http://www.cipne.org...
Registration closes May 13th

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
